assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Colowide Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the planning, operation, management, and franchise of food service chain restaurants in Japan and internationally. The company also manufactures and sells confectionery, such as chocolate and baked goods, as well as steak sauce for commercial use and general consumption; sells and distributes liquors, etc.; sells cigarettes and liquors; manages karaoke rooms; and operates meal providing services. In addition, it is involved in the procurement, processing, and sale of various food stuffs; planning, manufacturing, and sale of self-ordering systems comprising Menu-kun; and product planning and research, raw material production and procurement, and manufacturing and logistics, as well as delicatessen business. Further, the company operates the Wolfgang Puck restaurant; and Izakaya, Japanese-style pubs. The company operates its restaurants under the Doma Doma, Kamadoka, HOKKAIDO, San-Roku-Go Sakaba, YAKITORI, AMATARO, Gyu-Kaku, Shabu Shabu On-Yasai, Freshness Burger, LA PAUSA, MIYA, KARUBI TAISHO, GANKO-EN & GANKO-TEI, GIRI-NO-TOKUBE, KATSUDOKI, NE-NE-YA, IROHANIHOHETO, and JIYU-KAN brand names. It operates 1,433 direct management stores and 1,352 franchise stores. Colowide Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1963 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.
